question: The first ever Industry-Academia mission to accelerate biopharmaceutical development in India is named as ______________.
explanation: The first ever Industry-Academia mission to accelerate biopharmaceutical development in India was named Innovate in India (i3). It is launched by the Cabinet Minister for Science and Technology, Earth Sciences, Environment, Forests and Climate Change, Dr. Harsh Vardhan. It is an investment of USD 250 million with USD 125 million as a loan from world Bank and is anticipated to be a game changer for the Indian Biopharmaceutical industry.
